communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New Mexico Inspection of Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

State of New Mexico v. Nicholas Ortiz
Case number:
D-101-CR-201500203
AND/OR
D-101-CR-201500087

As the conviction in this case was affirmed by the New Mexico supreme court, I am  requesting the following:

Copies of video/audio recording of: 

Initial police contact, arrest,  interview, statements, or questioning (if any) of Nicholas Ortiz in  2011 or 2012.  This includes any surveillance video, if any.  

Police contact, arrest, interview, statements, questioning, or other contact with Ashley Roybal, starting on or around September 2012 to January 2016, if any.

Police contact, arrest interview, statements, questioning, or other contact with Jose Roybal starting on or around September 2012 to January 2016, if any. 

Audio/video recording of Nicholas Ortiz while in police custody on or around February 2015. This includes observed phone calls and records of relevant text messages obtained by investigators through this time as reported.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 15 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jamie Daly
